sentences.text: Legislative elections are scheduled to be held in Argentina on 26 October 2025. Half of the seats in the Argentine Chamber of Deputies|Chamber of Deputies and a third of the seats in the Argentine Senate|Senate will be elected.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite news |date=2024-10-16 |title=Why Milei Can't Lift Argentina's Currency Controls Any Time Soon |url=https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-10-16/why-milei-can-t-lift-argentina-s-currency-controls-any-time-soon-shock-therapy |access-date=2024-10-22 |work=Bloomberg.com |language=en}}</ref>

<ref>{{Cite web |date=September 29, 2024 |title=Argentina's Milei predicts 2025 election shakeup at party launch |url=https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentinas-milei-predicts-2025-election-shakeup-party-launch-2024-09-29/ |website=Reuters}}</ref>

sentences.text: These midterm elections will be the first during the presidency of Javier Milei.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |last=Página{{!}}12 |date=2024-10-19 |title=Elecciones 2025: ¿qué se puede esperar de los comicios de medio término? {{!}} Opinión pública |url=https://www.pagina12.com.ar/775936-elecciones-2025-que-se-puede-esperar-de-los-comicios-de-medi |access-date=2024-10-22 |website=PAGINA12 |language=es}}</ref>
